description: The head nurse of the Fortress of Meropide, Sigewinne is a Hydro bow user who excels at healing, buffing, and supporting her team.
info: Sigewinne is a 5★ Hydro healer/support who excels at healing, buffing, and supporting her team. Build her for HP%, Healing Bonus, and Energy Recharge.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Syringe Shot
skills.desc: Performs up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 5 consecutive shots with a bow.
Charged Attack
Performs a more precise Aimed Shot with increased DMG. A fully charged shot deals Hydro DMG.
Plunging Attack
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Rejuvenating Bubble
skills.desc: Sigewinne fires a healing bubble that bounces between allies, healing them and dealing Hydro DMG to enemies.
skills.details_html:
Rejuvenating Bubble
Fires a healing bubble that bounces between allies, healing them and dealing Hydro DMG to enemies. Healing and DMG scale with Sigewinne's Max HP.

skills.name: Nurse's Oath
skills.desc: Sigewinne creates a field of healing water, continuously healing allies and dealing Hydro DMG to enemies inside.
skills.details_html:
Nurse's Oath
Creates a field of healing water, continuously healing allies and dealing Hydro DMG to enemies inside. Healing and DMG scale with Sigewinne's Max HP.

passive_talents.name: Nurse's Touch
passive_talents.desc: After using Rejuvenating Bubble, Sigewinne's Healing Bonus is increased by 20% for 10s.

passive_talents.name: Fontaine's Blessing
passive_talents.desc: Allies inside Nurse's Oath's field gain 20% increased Hydro DMG Bonus.

passive_talents.name: Gentle Care
passive_talents.desc: When Sigewinne is in the party, cooking a perfect dish has a 12% chance to double the product.

constellations.name: Tide's Embrace
constellations.desc: Allies healed by Sigewinne gain 20% increased ATK for 8s.

constellations.name: Ocean's Gift
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Rejuvenating Bubble by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Restorative Flow
constellations.desc: Allies inside Nurse's Oath's field gain 20% increased Healing Bonus.

constellations.name: Blessed Tides
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Nurse's Oath by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Fontaine's Grace
constellations.desc: When an ally is healed by Sigewinne, they gain 20% increased Energy Recharge for 8s.
